Articles.Content:
Straight Rocketry & aeronautical industries.

I, the CEO of Straight RAI would like to introduce you to Straight, and our mission. I created straight so that the kerbals, the friendly inhabitants of kerbin, No longer had to be forced into insane contraptions that some crazy fool in the VAB devised. My designs,and those of my employees are safety tested,so you will never have to reconstruct your space centre due to explosions, or have to witness the sad death of a kerbalnaught again. I hope you enjoy flying our impeccable designs into orbit time and time again.

Good luck, (not that you shall need it) And have fun exploring the

final frontier, Kerspace.

Straight CEO, John (TheRocketMan)

Edited August 13, 2012 by TheRocketMan

Straight RAI Future Releases

Our first release, the Straight Saturn will be realeased as soon as I return home from holiday / Vacation. It is A Light / Medium lifter, capable of long range, stable flight.

Edited August 13, 2012 by TheRocketMan

*Trying to find format to display employee placement

Edited August 13, 2012 by TheRocketMan
*Note-I will be adding the next two sections and my first 3 spacecraft designs as soon as I arrive home tommorow.
TheRocketMan - Please do not make a thread unless you have a release to present.
Sorry, I have it ready,but at the moment I amon a linux netbook and I had the thread pre typed.
